text: María Teresa Torró Flor was the defending champion, but chose not to participate. Iga Świątek won the title, defeating Kimberley Zimmermann in the final, 6–2, 6–2. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw Montreux Ladies Open - Singles
title: 2018 Montreux Ladies Open – Singles
